Menus Food Truck Delivery If you're looking for a friendly spot to enjoy a cold beer & fresh local seafood in a laid back setting, you're going to love Hurricane Patty's. 
Located on Oyster Creek in St. Augustine, Hurricane Patty's is the perfect spot for taking in wildlife and scenic St. Augustine sunsets. At Patty's you’ll find a fresh, colorful and fun restaurant experience inspired by the islands. Whether navigating from the waterways or a local landlubber, with guidance from our warm and welcoming staff our guests discover the bold flavors and vibrant cultures of the tropics, all with a nice southern twist. Our approachable menu features fresh seafood and grilled meats, world renown appetizers and freshly prepared sauces. Locals love our happy hours and live music. Kick back island style and enjoy a wide array of signature drinks, including our infamous Category 5 Hurricane Cocktail ! About Us | Hurricane Patty's Waterfront Restaurant Navigation Message from the Owner Menus Lunch Dinner Raw Bar Dessert Drinks Specials All You Can Eat Crab & Shrimp Lunch Specials Happy Hour Daily Specials Monday – All You Can Eat Friday – Boil Fest Fridays Limited Time Specials Catering Event Catering Catering Delivered Food Truck Group Events Takeout & Delivery Reservations Message from the Owner Menus Lunch Dinner Raw Bar Dessert Drinks Specials All You Can Eat Crab & Shrimp Lunch Specials Happy Hour Daily Specials Monday – All You Can Eat Friday – Boil Fest Fridays Limited Time Specials Catering Event Catering Catering Delivered Food Truck Group Events Takeout & Delivery Reservations welcome to hurricane patty's Waterfront dining featuring the freshest seafood, award-winning signature cocktails, and a deep connection to the rich history of Florida’s First Coast. Shrimping is what shaped St. Augustine, Florida—from our local culture to the local flavor. As the largest shrimp port on the East coast, St. Augustine was also known as the largest producer of fishing vessels in the world. For decades, St. Augustine has supported the shrimpers, boat builders, and fisherman who called this port their home. Hurricane Patty’s Waterfront Bar & Grill has been retrofitted in a 1920s historic fish house where fresh shrimp and fish were cleaned before they made their way to market. Later, shrimp boats were crafted here, too, built and balanced on railroad tracks until construction was finished and they were “rolled” -into into what the locals called “Oyster Creek.”. Here at Hurricane Patty’s we pay homage to our local and historic heritage. Today, we’re proud to be serving the freshest and finest seafood we can get our hands on, local if possible. Our warm and welcoming staff will make you feel right at home and our killer award-winning cocktails , like the Hurricane Category 5 or  Playing-it-Safe Datil Smoothie. They will hit the spot and make you feel like you’re always on Florida time. Join us for live music by the water, oysters on the half-shell, our weekend Bloody Mary Bar, or an Open Mic night every Sunday. We’re always serving up daily specials and fresh seafood like our Coconut Rum Shrimp, Olde English Fish & Chips, Scallops, Lobster, or Grouper, in addition to salads, pastas, grilled meats, and our world-renowned appetizers that are bound to knock your socks off. Oh! And, we hope you’re not afraid of ghosts—cause we’ve got one. Rumor has it, our restaurant is haunted. She’s a heartbroken woman still pining for her lover who never returned from sea. Can you hear her crying? Stop by and you may feel her sadness or even hear her slam the bathroom door...! Hurricane Patty's Bar and Grill (904) 342-7338 Oyster Creek Marina 69 Lewis Blvd. St. Augustine, FL 32084 Mon - Thu: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Fri - Sat: 11:00 am - 10:00 pm Sun: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm View Google Map Share This Show all Hurricane Patty's Bar and Grill offers waterfront dining for lunch and dinner. Located at Oyster Creek Marina, this restaurant is accessible by boat or car. Seafood entrees are offered daily, such as low-country boils, crab leg dinners, and world-famous gator cakes (chicken of the swamp). In addition to seafood, they offer soups, salads, grilled meats, and an array of appetizers. The dessert menu includes several freshly-made sweets, including the fan-favorite, tart key lime pie. The rum runner, piña colada, and painkiller are popular cocktails at the restaurant's bar, but mocktail versions are also available. Hurricane Patty's offers Happy Hour from 3:00 - 7:00 p.m. daily, with drink specials and 50-cent wings and oysters. The outdoor deck is pet friendly and provides a calming atmosphere for enjoying dinner with friends and family. On Fridays and Saturdays, guests are welcomed to live music. Hurricane Patty's accepts reservations online and offers takeout, delivery, and catering options. About Us | Hurricane Patty's Waterfront Restaurant Navigation Message from the Owner Menus Lunch Dinner Raw Bar Dessert Drinks Specials All You Can Eat Crab & Shrimp Lunch Specials Happy Hour Daily Specials Monday – All You Can Eat Friday – Boil Fest Fridays Limited Time Specials Catering Event Catering Catering Delivered Food Truck Group Events Takeout & Delivery Reservations Message from the Owner Menus Lunch Dinner Raw Bar Dessert Drinks Specials All You Can Eat Crab & Shrimp Lunch Specials Happy Hour Daily Specials Monday – All You Can Eat Friday – Boil Fest Fridays Limited Time Specials Catering Event Catering Catering Delivered Food Truck Group Events Takeout & Delivery Reservations welcome to hurricane patty's Waterfront dining featuring the freshest seafood, award-winning signature cocktails, and a deep connection to the rich history of Florida’s First Coast. Shrimping is what shaped St. Augustine, Florida—from our local culture to the local flavor. As the largest shrimp port on the East coast, St. Augustine was also known as the largest producer of fishing vessels in the world. For decades, St. Augustine has supported the shrimpers, boat builders, and fisherman who called this port their home. Hurricane Patty’s Waterfront Bar & Grill has been retrofitted in a 1920s historic fish house where fresh shrimp and fish were cleaned before they made their way to market. Later, shrimp boats were crafted here, too, built and balanced on railroad tracks until construction was finished and they were “rolled” -into into what the locals called “Oyster Creek.”. Here at Hurricane Patty’s we pay homage to our local and historic heritage. Today, we’re proud to be serving the freshest and finest seafood we can get our hands on, local if possible. Our warm and welcoming staff will make you feel right at home and our killer award-winning cocktails , like the Hurricane Category 5 or  Playing-it-Safe Datil Smoothie. They will hit the spot and make you feel like you’re always on Florida time. Join us for live music by the water, oysters on the half-shell, our weekend Bloody Mary Bar, or an Open Mic night every Sunday. We’re always serving up daily specials and fresh seafood like our Coconut Rum Shrimp, Olde English Fish & Chips, Scallops, Lobster, or Grouper, in addition to salads, pastas, grilled meats, and our world-renowned appetizers that are bound to knock your socks off. Oh! And, we hope you’re not afraid of ghosts—cause we’ve got one. Rumor has it, our restaurant is haunted. She’s a heartbroken woman still pining for her lover who never returned from sea. Can you hear her crying? Stop by and you may feel her sadness or even hear her slam the bathroom door...! Menus Food Truck Delivery If you're looking for a friendly spot to enjoy a cold beer & fresh local seafood in a laid back setting, you're going to love Hurricane Patty's. 
Located on Oyster Creek in St. Augustine, Hurricane Patty's is the perfect spot for taking in wildlife and scenic St. Augustine sunsets. At Patty's you’ll find a fresh, colorful and fun restaurant experience inspired by the islands. Whether navigating from the waterways or a local landlubber, with guidance from our warm and welcoming staff our guests discover the bold flavors and vibrant cultures of the tropics, all with a nice southern twist. Our approachable menu features fresh seafood and grilled meats, world renown appetizers and freshly prepared sauces. Locals love our happy hours and live music. Menus Food Truck Delivery If you're looking for a friendly spot to enjoy a cold beer & fresh local seafood in a laid back setting, you're going to love Hurricane Patty's. 
Located on Oyster Creek in St. Augustine, Hurricane Patty's is the perfect spot for taking in wildlife and scenic St. Augustine sunsets. At Patty's you’ll find a fresh, colorful and fun restaurant experience inspired by the islands. Whether navigating from the waterways or a local landlubber, with guidance from our warm and welcoming staff our guests discover the bold flavors and vibrant cultures of the tropics, all with a nice southern twist. Our approachable menu features fresh seafood and grilled meats, world renown appetizers and freshly prepared sauces. Locals love our happy hours and live music. Kick back island style and enjoy a wide array of signature drinks, including our infamous Category 5 Hurricane Cocktail ! About Us | Hurricane Patty's Waterfront Restaurant Navigation Message from the Owner Menus Lunch Dinner Raw Bar Dessert Drinks Specials All You Can Eat Crab & Shrimp Lunch Specials Happy Hour Daily Specials Monday – All You Can Eat Friday – Boil Fest Fridays Limited Time Specials Catering Event Catering Catering Delivered Food Truck Group Events Takeout & Delivery Reservations Message from the Owner Menus Lunch Dinner Raw Bar Dessert Drinks Specials All You Can Eat Crab & Shrimp Lunch Specials Happy Hour Daily Specials Monday – All You Can Eat Friday – Boil Fest Fridays Limited Time Specials Catering Event Catering Catering Delivered Food Truck Group Events Takeout & Delivery Reservations welcome to hurricane patty's Waterfront dining featuring the freshest seafood, award-winning signature cocktails, and a deep connection to the rich history of Florida’s First Coast. Shrimping is what shaped St. Augustine, Florida—from our local culture to the local flavor. As the largest shrimp port on the East coast, St. Augustine was also known as the largest producer of fishing vessels in the world. For decades, St. Augustine has supported the shrimpers, boat builders, and fisherman who called this port their home. Hurricane Patty’s Waterfront Bar & Grill has been retrofitted in a 1920s historic fish house where fresh shrimp and fish were cleaned before they made their way to market. Later, shrimp boats were crafted here, too, built and balanced on railroad tracks until construction was finished and they were “rolled” -into into what the locals called “Oyster Creek.”. Here at Hurricane Patty’s we pay homage to our local and historic heritage. Today, we’re proud to be serving the freshest and finest seafood we can get our hands on, local if possible. Our warm and welcoming staff will make you feel right at home and our killer award-winning cocktails , like the Hurricane Category 5 or  Playing-it-Safe Datil Smoothie. They will hit the spot and make you feel like you’re always on Florida time. Join us for live music by the water, oysters on the half-shell, our weekend Bloody Mary Bar, or an Open Mic night every Sunday. We’re always serving up daily specials and fresh seafood like our Coconut Rum Shrimp, Olde English Fish & Chips, Scallops, Lobster, or Grouper, in addition to salads, pastas, grilled meats, and our world-renowned appetizers that are bound to knock your socks off. Oh! And, we hope you’re not afraid of ghosts—cause we’ve got one. Rumor has it, our restaurant is haunted. She’s a heartbroken woman still pining for her lover who never returned from sea. Can you hear her crying? Stop by and you may feel her sadness or even hear her slam the bathroom door...! Hurricane Patty's Bar and Grill (904) 342-7338 Oyster Creek Marina 69 Lewis Blvd. St. Augustine, FL 32084 Mon - Thu: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Fri - Sat: 11:00 am - 10:00 pm Sun: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm View Google Map Share This Show all Hurricane Patty's Bar and Grill offers waterfront dining for lunch and dinner. Located at Oyster Creek Marina, this restaurant is accessible by boat or car. Seafood entrees are offered daily, such as low-country boils, crab leg dinners, and world-famous gator cakes (chicken of the swamp). In addition to seafood, they offer soups, salads, grilled meats, and an array of appetizers. The dessert menu includes several freshly-made sweets, including the fan-favorite, tart key lime pie. The rum runner, piña colada, and painkiller are popular cocktails at the restaurant's bar, but mocktail versions are also available. Hurricane Patty's offers Happy Hour from 3:00 - 7:00 p.m. daily, with drink specials and 50-cent wings and oysters. The outdoor deck is pet friendly and provides a calming atmosphere for enjoying dinner with friends and family. On Fridays and Saturdays, guests are welcomed to live music. Hurricane Patty's accepts reservations online and offers takeout, delivery, and catering options. Hurricane Patty's Bar and Grill (904) 342-7338 Oyster Creek Marina 69 Lewis Blvd. St. Augustine, FL 32084 Mon - Thu: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Fri - Sat: 11:00 am - 10:00 pm Sun: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm View Google Map Share This Show all Hurricane Patty's Bar and Grill offers waterfront dining for lunch and dinner. Located at Oyster Creek Marina, this restaurant is accessible by boat or car. Seafood entrees are offered daily, such as low-country boils, crab leg dinners, and world-famous gator cakes (chicken of the swamp). In addition to seafood, they offer soups, salads, grilled meats, and an array of appetizers. The dessert menu includes several freshly-made sweets, including the fan-favorite, tart key lime pie. The rum runner, piña colada, and painkiller are popular cocktails at the restaurant's bar, but mocktail versions are also available. Hurricane Patty's offers Happy Hour from 3:00 - 7:00 p.m. daily, with drink specials and 50-cent wings and oysters. The outdoor deck is pet friendly and provides a calming atmosphere for enjoying dinner with friends and family. On Fridays and Saturdays, guests are welcomed to live music. Hurricane Patty's accepts reservations online and offers takeout, delivery, and catering options. About Us | Hurricane Patty's Waterfront Restaurant Navigation Message from the Owner Menus Lunch Dinner Raw Bar Dessert Drinks Specials All You Can Eat Crab & Shrimp Lunch Specials Happy Hour Daily Specials Monday – All You Can Eat Friday – Boil Fest Fridays Limited Time Specials Catering Event Catering Catering Delivered Food Truck Group Events Takeout & Delivery Reservations Message from the Owner Menus Lunch Dinner Raw Bar Dessert Drinks Specials All You Can Eat Crab & Shrimp Lunch Specials Happy Hour Daily Specials Monday – All You Can Eat Friday – Boil Fest Fridays Limited Time Specials Catering Event Catering Catering Delivered Food Truck Group Events Takeout & Delivery Reservations welcome to hurricane patty's Waterfront dining featuring the freshest seafood, award-winning signature cocktails, and a deep connection to the rich history of Florida’s First Coast. Shrimping is what shaped St. Augustine, Florida—from our local culture to the local flavor. As the largest shrimp port on the East coast, St. Augustine was also known as the largest producer of fishing vessels in the world. For decades, St. Augustine has supported the shrimpers, boat builders, and fisherman who called this port their home. Hurricane Patty’s Waterfront Bar & Grill has been retrofitted in a 1920s historic fish house where fresh shrimp and fish were cleaned before they made their way to market. Later, shrimp boats were crafted here, too, built and balanced on railroad tracks until construction was finished and they were “rolled” -into into what the locals called “Oyster Creek.”. Here at Hurricane Patty’s we pay homage to our local and historic heritage. Today, we’re proud to be serving the freshest and finest seafood we can get our hands on, local if possible. Our warm and welcoming staff will make you feel right at home and our killer award-winning cocktails , like the Hurricane Category 5 or  Playing-it-Safe Datil Smoothie. They will hit the spot and make you feel like you’re always on Florida time. Join us for live music by the water, oysters on the half-shell, our weekend Bloody Mary Bar, or an Open Mic night every Sunday. We’re always serving up daily specials and fresh seafood like our Coconut Rum Shrimp, Olde English Fish & Chips, Scallops, Lobster, or Grouper, in addition to salads, pastas, grilled meats, and our world-renowned appetizers that are bound to knock your socks off. Oh! And, we hope you’re not afraid of ghosts—cause we’ve got one. Rumor has it, our restaurant is haunted. She’s a heartbroken woman still pining for her lover who never returned from sea. Can you hear her crying? Stop by and you may feel her sadness or even hear her slam the bathroom door...! About Us | Hurricane Patty's Waterfront Restaurant Navigation Message from the Owner Menus Lunch Dinner Raw Bar Dessert Drinks Specials All You Can Eat Crab & Shrimp Lunch Specials Happy Hour Daily Specials Monday – All You Can Eat Friday – Boil Fest Fridays Limited Time Specials Catering Event Catering Catering Delivered Food Truck Group Events Takeout & Delivery Reservations Message from the Owner Menus Lunch Dinner Raw Bar Dessert Drinks Specials All You Can Eat Crab & Shrimp Lunch Specials Happy Hour Daily Specials Monday – All You Can Eat Friday – Boil Fest Fridays Limited Time Specials Catering Event Catering Catering Delivered Food Truck Group Events Takeout & Delivery Reservations welcome to hurricane patty's Waterfront dining featuring the freshest seafood, award-winning signature cocktails, and a deep connection to the rich history of Florida’s First Coast. Shrimping is what shaped St. Augustine, Florida—from our local culture to the local flavor. As the largest shrimp port on the East coast, St. Augustine was also known as the largest producer of fishing vessels in the world. For decades, St. Augustine has supported the shrimpers, boat builders, and fisherman who called this port their home. Hurricane Patty’s Waterfront Bar & Grill has been retrofitted in a 1920s historic fish house where fresh shrimp and fish were cleaned before they made their way to market. Later, shrimp boats were crafted here, too, built and balanced on railroad tracks until construction was finished and they were “rolled” -into into what the locals called “Oyster Creek.”. Here at Hurricane Patty’s we pay homage to our local and historic heritage. Today, we’re proud to be serving the freshest and finest seafood we can get our hands on, local if possible. Our warm and welcoming staff will make you feel right at home and our killer award-winning cocktails , like the Hurricane Category 5 or  Playing-it-Safe Datil Smoothie. They will hit the spot and make you feel like you’re always on Florida time. Join us for live music by the water, oysters on the half-shell, our weekend Bloody Mary Bar, or an Open Mic night every Sunday. We’re always serving up daily specials and fresh seafood like our Coconut Rum Shrimp, Olde English Fish & Chips, Scallops, Lobster, or Grouper, in addition to salads, pastas, grilled meats, and our world-renowned appetizers that are bound to knock your socks off. Oh! And, we hope you’re not afraid of ghosts—cause we’ve got one. Rumor has it, our restaurant is haunted. She’s a heartbroken woman still pining for her lover who never returned from sea. Can you hear her crying? Stop by and you may feel her sadness or even hear her slam the bathroom door...!
